00021 const int DEFAULT_ADDRESS_UNIT_BITS = 8;
00022 
00023 // the constructor
00024 AddressSpace::AddressSpace(QDomNode &addrSpaceNode): name_(QString()),
00025                 range_(QString()), rangeAttributes_(), width_(-1), widthAttributes_(),
00026                 addressUnitBits_(DEFAULT_ADDRESS_UNIT_BITS), localMemoryMap_(0),
00027                 parameters_() {
00028         for (int i = 0; i < addrSpaceNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00029                 QDomNode tempNode = addrSpaceNode.childNodes().at(i);
00030 
00031                 // get name
00032                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00033                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 // get range
00037                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:range")) {
00038                         range_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00039 
00040                         // get the attributes
00041                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, rangeAttributes_);
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 // get width
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:width")) {
00046                         width_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00047 
00048                         // get the attributes
00049                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, widthAttributes_);
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 // get addressUnitBits
00053                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressUnitBits")) {
00054                         addressUnitBits_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:localMemoryMap")) {
00058                         localMemoryMap_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryMap>(
00059                                         new MemoryMap(tempNode));
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00063                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00064                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00065                                 parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00066                                                 new Parameter(parameterNode)));
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069         }
00070 
00071         if (name_.isNull()) {
00072                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00073                                 "spirit:addressSpace"));
00074         }
00075 
00076         if (range_.isNull()) {
00077                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element range missing in"
00078                                 " spirit:addressSpace"));
00079         }
00080 
00081         if (width_ < 0) {
00082                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element width missing in "
00083                                 "spirit:addressSpace"));
00084         }
00085         return;
00086 }
00087 
00088 AddressSpace::AddressSpace( const AddressSpace &other ):
00089 name_(other.name_),
00090 range_(other.range_),
00091 rangeAttributes_(other.rangeAttributes_),
00092 width_(other.width_),
00093 widthAttributes_(other.widthAttributes_),
00094 addressUnitBits_(other.addressUnitBits_),
00095 localMemoryMap_(),
00096 parameters_() {
00097 
00098         if (other.localMemoryMap_) {
00099                 localMemoryMap_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryMap>(
00100                         new MemoryMap(*other.localMemoryMap_.data()));
00101         }
00102 
00103         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00104                 if (param) {
00105                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00106                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 }

00112 AddressSpace & AddressSpace::operator=( const AddressSpace &other ) {
00113         if (this != &other) {
00114                 name_ = other.name_;
00115                 range_ = other.range_;
00116                 rangeAttributes_ = other.rangeAttributes_;
00117                 width_ = other.width_;
00118                 widthAttributes_ = other.widthAttributes_;
00119                 addressUnitBits_ = other.addressUnitBits_;
00120 
00121                 if (other.localMemoryMap_) {
00122                         localMemoryMap_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryMap>(
00123                                 new MemoryMap(*other.localMemoryMap_.data()));
00124                 }
00125                 else
00126                         localMemoryMap_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryMap>();
00127 
00128                 parameters_.clear();
00129                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00130                         if (param) {
00131                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00132                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00133                         }
00134                 }
00135         }
00136         return *this;
00137 }

00139 // the desctructor
00140 AddressSpace::~AddressSpace() {
00141         rangeAttributes_.clear();
00142 
00143         widthAttributes_.clear();

00146 void AddressSpace::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00147         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:addressSpace");
00148 
00149         // if mandatory name is missing
00150         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00151                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in spirit:"
00152                                 "addressSpace"));
00153         }
00154         else {
00155                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00156         }
00157 
00158         // if mandatory range is missing
00159         if (range_.isEmpty()) {
00160                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element range is missing in "
00161                                 "spirit:addressSpace"));
00162         }
00163         else {
00164                 // start the spirit:range tag
00165                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:range");
00166 
00167                 // write the attributes for the element
00168                 General::writeAttributes(writer, rangeAttributes_);
00169 
00170                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00171                 writer.writeCharacters(range_);
00172                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:range
00173         }
00174 
00175         // if mandatory element width is missing
00176         if (width_ < 0) {
00177                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element width missing in "
00178                                 "spirit:addressSpace"));
00179         }
00180         else {
00181                 // start the spirit:width element
00182                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:width");
00183 
00184                 // write the attributes for the element
00185                 General::writeAttributes(writer, widthAttributes_);
00186 
00187                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00188                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(width_));
00189                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:width
00190         }
00191 
00192         // if addressUnitBits has illegal value
00193         if (addressUnitBits_ < 1) {
00194                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("AddressUnitBits has illegal value in "
00195                                 "spirit:addressSpace"));
00196         }
00197         else {
00198                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:addressUnitBits",
00199                                 QString::number(addressUnitBits_));
00200         }
00201 
00202         if (localMemoryMap_) {
00203                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:localMemoryMap");
00204                 localMemoryMap_->write(writer);
00205                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:localMemoryMap
00206         }
00207 
00208         // if any parameters exist
00209         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00210                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00211 
00212                 // write each parameter
00213                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00214                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00218         }
00219 
00220         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:addressSpace
00221 }
